title: Problems with screen shots and swiping up
content:
I have a Google pixel 4a. I have only had it for a couple weeks. I used to be able to just swipe up from the bottom of my screen, then choose an app from the alphabetized list. Now nothing happens when I swipe up!

Also, I used to be able to press and hold the power button then choose "screen shot" to take a screen shot. Now when I press and hold the power button, it doesn't give me that option!

What is going on?

Please help asap
